homepage.title: MyCoRe
homepage.text: Your framework for presentation and management of digital content

image.title: versatile
image.description: for repositories, archives, digitised, image collections and much more

image.title: adaptable
image.description: with own data model, search function, layout for your own repository

image.title: persistent
image.description: continuous developement in a community since more than 10 years
